summary: Comprehensive testing of AEGIS MIND Electronic Warfare Decision Support System completed. Backend APIs fully operational with 100% success rate. Frontend dashboard loads correctly with dark tactical theme, interactive map, threat assessment panels, and AI integration working. All core features tested successfully including scenario activation, navigation between panels, and real-time data display.

ui_bugs.issue: Click interception by Emergent badge overlay preventing AI message submission
ui_bugs.workaround: AI input field and interface loads correctly, only click interception issue

passed_tests: Backend health check (200 OK)
GET /api/emitters returns 8 emitters with proper structure
GET /api/scenarios returns 3 demo scenarios
GET /api/threats/assess returns threat assessments (6 total, 5 critical)
GET /api/countermeasures returns 5 countermeasure options
GET /api/metrics returns system performance data
POST /api/ai/chat returns AI responses using Gemini 2.5 Flash
POST /api/scenarios/{id}/activate successfully loads scenario emitters
Dashboard loads with proper dark tactical theme
Battle map displays with Taiwan Strait view and emitter markers
Map legend shows hostile/friendly/unknown/neutral markers correctly
Threat panel displays threat assessments with scores and recommendations
Navigation sidebar switches between all panels (threats, AI, countermeasures, timeline, metrics)
Scenario selector dropdown opens and shows 3 scenarios
Scenario activation works - loads 5 emitters successfully
System metrics panel shows real-time performance data
Countermeasures panel displays EW response options with success rates
Threat timeline shows chronological event log
Emitter analysis panel loads with detailed information
System time updates correctly in header
Refresh functionality works
All metric badges display current counts (tracking, hostile, friendly)
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI fix needed: Remove or adjust Emergent badge overlay that intercepts clicks on AI send button. All other functionality is working correctly.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major features working, minor click interception issue
